mapper.select: SELECT startDate, endDate , LEFT(startTime,5) AS startTime , LEFT(endTime,5) AS endTime, (CASE state WHEN 0 THEN '대기' WHEN 1 THEN '진행중' WHEN 2 THEN '승인' WHEN 3 THEN '반려' WHEN 7 THEN '사용 완료' WHEN 9 THEN '철회' END) AS state FROM vacation WHERE vacaNo = (SELECT MAX(vacaNo) FROM vacation WHERE userid = #{userid});
SELECT keepVaca, useVaca, ROUND(keepVaca/8,0) keepVaca_day, ROUND(useVaca/8,0) useVaca_day FROM user WHERE userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vacation (userid, reason, startTime, endTime, startDate, endDate) VALUES (#{userid}, #{reason}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: SELECT v.vacaNo, v.userid, v.startDate, v.endDate , DATE_FORMAT(v.startTime, '%H:%i') AS startTime , DATE_FORMAT(v.endTime, '%H:%i') AS endTime , v.state, reason, rdate, u.name FROM vacation v INNER JOIN user u ON v.userid = u.userid WHERE vacaNo = #{vacaNo}

SELECT vs.*, u.name, u.dept, (CASE WHEN u.position = 'C' THEN '대표' WHEN u.position = 'D' THEN '부장' WHEN u.position = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN u.position = 'E' THEN '사원' END ) AS position , s.signorder, LAG(vs.state) OVER() AS prev_state FROM vacasign vs INNER JOIN signline s ON vs.signlineno = s.signlineno INNER JOIN user u ON s.userid = u.userid WHERE vs.vacaNo = #{vacaNo} ORDER BY signOrder
SELECT * FROM vacation WHERE state = 2 AND startDate = #{today}

SELECT v.*, u.name, (CASE WHEN u.position = 'C' THEN '대표' WHEN u.position = 'D' THEN '부장' WHEN u.position = 'L' THEN '팀장' WHEN u.position = 'E' THEN '사원' END ) AS position, (CASE WHEN u.dept = 'M' THEN '대표' WHEN u.dept = 'D' THEN '개발부' WHEN u.dept = 'S' THEN '영업부' WHEN u.dept = 'P' THEN '기획부' WHEN u.dept = 'H' THEN '인사부' END ) AS dept FROM vacation v INNER JOIN user u ON v.userid = u.userid WHERE v.state IN (2,7)
